title: Voting Machine Problems in Arizona Fuel Right-Wing Fraud Claims
description: Maricopa County said it had isolated the problem: printers were not making dark enough markings on the ballots, and that it was not a software problem.
dc:creator: Stuart A. Thompson, Jack Healy and Neil Vigdor
media:credit: Ilana Panich-Linsman for The New York Times
media:description: A room at the Maricopa County Tabulation and Election Center in Phoenix.
